title: Device Activation and Deactivation State Machine
name: LGF_ActDeactDevice
description: Implements a state machine to activate and monitor or deactivate decentral devices.

input.name: activate
input.description: Rising edge: Activate device given by `hwId`

input.name: deactivate
input.description: Rising edge: Deactivate device given by `hwId`

input.name: hwId
input.description: Hardware ID of the device which should be activated / deactivated

output.name: valid
output.description: TRUE: Valid set of output values available at the FB

output.name: busy
output.description: TRUE: FB is not finished and new output values can be expected

output.name: error
output.description: TRUE: An error occurred during the execution of the FB

output.name: deviceStateOK
output.description: Device is activated and connected to IO-System

output.name: diagnostics
output.description: Diagnostic structure to store and transfer diagnostic information from blocks trough the interface.

status_codes.16#7000: STATUS_NO_CALL: No job being currently processed
status_codes.16#7001: STATUS_FIRST_CALL: First call after incoming new job
status_codes.16#7002: STATUS_SUBSEQUENT_CALL: Subsequent call during active processing
status_codes.16#8600: ERR_UNDEFINED_STATE: Due to an undefined state in state machine
status_codes.16#8601: ERR_LOG2GEO / ERR_GEO2LOG: Log2Geo or Geo2Log error, check diagnostics for more info
status_codes.16#8662: ERR_READ_DEVICES_STATES_DURING_ACTIVATION: Error: Read Device states (DeviceStates) during device activation
status_codes.16#8670: ERR_READ_DEVICES_STATES_WHILE_ACTIVE:Error: Read Device states (DeviceStates) while device active

status_codes.16#8690: ERR_DISABLING_DEACT_DEVICE: Deactivation (D_ACT_DP) of device throws an error while disabling

description_zh:
该函数块实现了一个用于激活和监控或停用分布式设备的状态机。它能够处理设备的激活和停用请求，并监控设备状态和错误信息。

输入:
- enable: 启用FB功能
- activate: 上升沿激活由`hwId`指定的设备
- deactivate: 上升沿停用由`hwId`指定的设备
- hwId: 要激活/停用的设备的硬件ID
- parameter: `LGF_ActDeactDevice`函数的参数集

输出:
- valid: 真表示FB的输出值有效
- busy: 真表示FB未完成，可以期待新的输出值
- error: 真表示在执行FB时发生错误
- status: 状态和错误识别
- activating: 设备激活状态
- isActivated: 设备已激活
- deactivating: 设备停用状态
- isDeactivated: 设备已停用
- deviceStateOK: 设备已激活并连接到IO系统
- diagnostics: 存储和传输来自块的诊断信息的结构

状态码:
- 16#7000: STATUS_NO_CALL: 当前没有处理作业
- 16#7001: STATUS_FIRST_CALL: 新作业后的第一次调用
- 16#7002: STATUS_SUBSEQUENT_CALL: 激活处理期间的后续调用
- 16#8600: ERR_UNDEFINED_STATE: 状态机中存在未定义状态
- 16#8601: ERR_LOG2GEO / ERR_GEO2LOG: Log2Geo或Geo2Log错误，检查诊断以获取更多信息
- 16#8640: ERR_DEVICE_DEACTIVATING: 设备停用时发生错误
- 16#8641: ERR_DEVICE_DEACTIVATING_TIME_OUT: 停用超时错误
- 16#8660: ERR_DEVICE_ACTIVATING: 设备激活时发生错误
- 16#8661: ERR_DEVICE_ACTIVATING_TIME_OUT: 激活超时错误
- 16#8662: ERR_READ_DEVICES_STATES_DURING_ACTIVATION: 激活期间读取设备状态（DeviceStates）时出错
- 16#8670: ERR_READ_DEVICES_STATES_WHILE_ACTIVE:在设备激活时读取设备状态（DeviceStates）时出错
- 16#8671: ERR_DEVICE_STATE_WHILE_ACTIVE: 设备状态出现错误，设备无法访问，设备或IO系统故障
- 16#8672: ERR_READ_ACTIVATION_STATE_WHILE_ACTIVE:设备的激活状态（D_ACT_DP）错误
- 16#8690: ERR_DISABLING_DEACT_DEVICE: 停用设备时禁用发生错误
- 16#8691: ERR_DISABLING_WATCHDOG:禁用时看门狗定时器超时

状态机处理流程如下：
1. 启用FB时，初始化FB并开始处理状态机。
2. 检测激活和停用命令，根据命令设置相应的状态。
3. 在每个状态下执行相应的操作，如发送激活/停用请求、监控设备状态、处理超时和错误等。
4. 根据处理结果更新输出值和诊断信息。
